Definition: Have you ever suffered from acute pain that required you to seek healthcare attention?
Has a doctor, nurse, or other health professional EVER told you that you had Depression?
Do you believe prescription drugs are safer than illicit drugs to treat pain?
Have you suffered from chronic pain?
Do you believe prescription drugs are safer than illicit drugs for other therapeutic purposes?
Has a doctor, nurse, or other health professional EVER told you that you had Anxiety?
Has a doctor, nurse, or other health professional EVER told you that you had Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) or Attention Deficit Disorder (ADD)?
Has a doctor, nurse, or other health professional EVER told you that you had Panic Disorder?
